title: Project-Based Learning Linked to Master’s Degrees in Social Sciences via Accreditation of Prior Experiential Learning (APEL)

context.prior_knowledge: Over 5 years of practical experience in social fields and completion of higher education
context.additional_context: Emphasis on Converting Learners' Workplace Experiences into Academic Reflections, with Collaboration and Assessment Conducted Using Digital Tools

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze their practical experiences in social fields and reconstruct them into academic papers at the master’s degree level
Learners can evaluate work-based learning outcomes according to APEL accreditation standards and link them to academic achievements
Learners create reflective reports incorporating peer feedback using digital tools and complete portfolios meeting degree accreditation requirements

resources: Social Studies Field-Based Project Case Database
APEL (Accreditation of Prior Experiential Learning) Certification Guidelines Template

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
